alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 04 at 6:23AM AKDT until August 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 10 PM AKDT SUNDAY FOR DENALI... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon Saturday to 10 PM AKDT Sunday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...North of the Denali Park Road. * TIMING...From noon Saturday to 10 PM AKDT Sunday. * WINDS...Southeast 15 to 25 mph. Gusts 30 to 40 mph in passes. * HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs near 80. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
